text: avarenu bhumiyalli tirugadi, tamaginta hindinavara gati enayitembudannu kanuvudillave? Avaru (hindinavaru) ivariginta heccu saktisaligalagiddaru, bhumiyalli ulume nadesiddaru mattu adannu (bhumiyannu) ivariginta heccu sampannagolisiddaru. Avara baligu avara dutaru spastavada puravegalondige bandiddaru. Allahanu avara mele akramavesaguvavanagiralilla. Svatah avare tam'ma mele akramavesagikondiddaru
